thread.title: I Want to Be Naughty! Vol 02 Ch 008
thread.title_full: I Want to Be Naughty! Vol 02 Ch 008

title: I Want to Be Naughty! Vol 02 Ch 008
text: *The series alternates between different sets of pairs. Although it's supposed to be read as a whole, you can skip volumes with the pair(s) you don't like. Warui Featuring the school delinquent Towa Aikawa and the student council president Mikado Shirahane. (Pair 1) V. involving this pairing are: V.01, V.02, V.04, V.07, V.11 ja Nai Kedo Featuring Shuuji Yukimura, the formidable student council vice-president, and the problematic childhood friend, Ryuuichi Shinonome (Towa's friend). (Pair 2) V. involving this pairing are: V.03, V.05, V.08, V.10, V.? Mujihi na Featuring Nanao Shirahane (Mikado's older brother), a male siren, and Kuon Aikawa (Towa's older brother), a fellow student attending the same university. (Pair 3) V. involving this pairing are: V.06, V.09, V.12 Shouwaru Ookami ga Koi o Shita Rashii (Wicked Wolf Seems to Be in Love) Featuring former student council president, Shirou Akagi (Mikado's rival in Warui Koibito and Warui Oujii) and disciplinary committee member, Nao Kousaka (Yukimura's rival in Sunao ja Nai Kedo). How will those two damaged people find their respective love? (Pair 4) V. involving this pairing are: V.13 Special chapters: - Suki Sugite Gomen ne (I'm Sorry That I Love You So Much) - Warui Koto Bakkashite Gomennasai] (Sorry For Doing Naughty Deeds) - Neko todo S Nadeshu Nyuu-sama (Cat and His Perverted Owner) - Osawari de Enryo Negai Masu (Don't Touch Me, Please) - Warui ko Tachi no Bansan (The Bad Boys' Diner) - Kira-senpai to Kokonoe-kun - Gekokujou (Kira-senpai and Kokonoe-kun - Junior Dominates Senior) - Non-fiction Title(s) in colors are still being scanlated. Reading Order (taken from the official website): (Volume number - Title [Pair number - Appearance number]) v01 - Warui Koto Shitai [1-1] v02 - Warui ko Demo Ii? [1-2] ---- Suki Sugite Gomen ne v03 - Kirai ja nai Kedo [2-1] v04 - Warui Otoko Demo Ii? [1-4] ---- Warui Koto Bakkashite Gomennasai [1-3 & 2-3] ---- Neko todo S Nadeshu Nyuu-sama v05 - Koi Ja nai Kedo [2-2] v06 - Mujihi na Otoko [3-1] v07 - Warui Koibito ja Dame? [1-5] ---- Osawari de Enryo Negai Masu v08 - Kare ja nai kedo [2-4] ---- Warui ko Tachi no Bansan [1-6 & 2-5] v09 - Mujihi na Anata [3-2] v10 - Sunao ja nai Kedo [2-6] v11 - Warui Ouji Demo Suki [1-7] v12 - Mujihi na Karada [3-3] ---- Kira-senpai to Kokonoe-kun ~Gekokujou~ [4-0] ---- Non-Fiction v13 - Shouwaru Ookami ga Koi o Shita Rashii [4-1] v? - Aikawa Ka no Konton Taru Mirai [5-1] v? - Himitsu ja nai Kedo [2-7] *Only extra not scanlated. *On-going. Caution to under-aged viewers: The series I Want to Be Naughty! contain themes or scenes that may not be suitable for very young readers thus is blocked for their protection. If you are 18 and above, Please click here to continue reading. Advertisement
